item.title: Graduate
item.description: Admissions Please visit the offical admissions for graduates course Courses ATM6101 ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION 1 radiation law. solar and terrestrial radiation. radiative process in the atmosphere. principle of remote sensing. ATM6102 CLOUD AND PRECIPITATION PROCESSES structure and patterns of cloud, cloud microphysics and precipitation mechanism, artificial rain ATM6103 ATMOSPHERIC DYNAMICS I conservation principle. approximation of the equation of motion. atmospheric oscillation. scaling analysis. ATM6104 ATMOSPHERIC DYNAMICS II geostrophic dynamics. atmospheric instability.
